MiNa-0.npc: Did you hear that Maurice used to be in love with Bertha? Apparently she rejected him because he was 40 years older than her. It’s a shame they didn’t marry, together they would have been the richest couple in the country!

MiNa-1.npc: The debt collectors will surely be paying a visit to Sam soon. He’s been bleeding money for months at the blackjack table.

MiNa-2.npc: I heard a rumor that Charles has been left off of Bertha’s will. Maybe he is as lazy as Avni says.

MiNa-3.npc: Of course not, I just asked you to find her. Hurry up and do your job.

MiNa-4.npc: You need a key to get in, Y-you can’t have it. Hurry up and find Bertha.
MiNa-4.player: Do you know how I can get into the security room?

MiNa-5.npc: This margarita is delicious, I think I might get another one;Have you tried Iwo’s Special Coupled Tempura? He doesn’t usually make it except for special occasions like tonight.;One of Bertha and Maurice’s old movies is going to be playing later tonight, I remember watching it back when it was released.;Don’t know what’s been going on between Avni and Charles… she’s been glaring at him all night.;Maurice looks ancient… how old is he? 90? 100?;Don’t you think Brange looks a little more nervous than usual? He seems pale.;Bertha must be extremely wealthy to be able to afford this place… It’s gigantic!;Sam is so handsome, it’s no wonder the ladies are obsessed with him.;The way Iwo’s sushi is encapsulated in seaweed is so classy.;I’ve eaten so much of Iwo’s sushi tonight - my stomach is sushi all the way down!;I think Mr. Bernanke might be counting cards… he never seems to lose at Blackjack.;Look how lonely Maurice seems. If only he’d gotten over Bertha and found a wife.

MiNa-7.npc: What? You aren’t supposed to go inside there.
MiNa-7.player: I found a belt with the initials C.F.D. on it in the security room. Do you know anything about this?

MiNa-8.player: I need the security tapes. Where are they?

MiNa-9.npc: I-I, U-uh W-we… Okay, look. I’ll tell you, but you have to keep this a secret, alright?

MiNa-10.npc: Ch-Charles and I are having an affair. I locked the tapes inside his room because it contains all the evidence. I’ll give you the keys to Charles’ room, just leave me alone.
MiNa-10.player: Just tell me what’s going on.

MiNa-11.npc: I thought I told you to leave me alone.

MiNa-12.npc: I thought I told you to leave me alone.

MiNa-13.npc: I thought I told you to leave me alone.

MiNa-14.npc: I thought I told you to leave me alone.
